title: Rear Upright (USC FSAE)
description: CNC‑machined rear upright prototype; CAM, fixturing, and verification.

title: EV Diff Mounts (USC FSAE EV)
description: Design and CNC machining of EV differential mounting brackets; CAM strategy, fixturing, and validation.

title: LPL Rocket Engine Component (USC)
description: 3D‑printed rocket engine component for the Liquid Propulsion Lab; creative workholding and complete machining on a 3‑axis CNC.

title: Oil Pan
description: Engine oil pan with tall baffles to reduce swashing; geometry required multiple step‑downs for a consistent surface finish.

title: Mini Front Upright (4th Axis)
description: Fun 4th‑axis machining of a mini front upright; creative workholding and indexed toolpaths.

title: Bell Cranks (Race Component)
description: Waterjetted then finish‑milled bell cranks that interface with dampers/shocks. Thin parts with swirly toolpath textures—fun and challenging workholding.

title: ARC Motor Hub (Advanced Combat Robotics)
description: Motor hub for ARC’s weapon system—great engineering design, CNC‑milled with simple soft jaws and tight bearing surface tolerances. Nicknamed the ‘Pokeball’.

title: Suspension Brackets
description: High‑volume suspension brackets (e.g., A‑arm interfaces). Machined from long bar stock, segmented, then finish‑milled. Thin parts; fun textures and efficient workflows.

title: Misc. Components
description: A grab‑bag of machining work—locknuts, IC diff mounts, coolant housing, brake pedal, and more. Too many parts to count; a fun mix of fixtures, textures, and finishes.

title: Automation Scripts
description: Collection of small utilities that automate repeatable tasks on Windows.
